Package com.google.orkut.client.api

The Core Orkut Client Library / API

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Application Information about an application on orkut.
 

Class Summary
ActivityEntry An activity entry.
ActivityEntry.ActivityType  
ActivityTxFactory A factory to create activity related Transaction on orkut.
Address The address of a user.
Album An album entity.
AlbumsTxFactory A factory to generate Albums related Transaction objects.
BatchTransaction Builds a batch request from Transactions.
BirthdayNotificationEntry Represents a birthday notification entry.
BirthdayNotificationTx Fetches list of pending friend requests.
CaptchaTxFactory Creates a transaction to submit a solution to captcha challenge.
Comment Represents a comment.
CommentEntry Represents a comments entry.
CommentsTxFactory Factory for creating transactions related to Comments.
Constants Constants used in orkut client library api.
Constants.Gender Defines possible values for a person's gender value as returned from OrkutPerson.getGender().
Constants.MediaItemType Defines possible values for a media-item in an activity, as returned from MediaItem.getType().
Constants.RelationshipStatus Defines the possible value to be sent in the call to UpdateProfileTx.setRelationshipStatus(String).
CreateAlbumTx A Transaction to create an album on orkut.
DeleteAlbumTx A Transaction to delete an album on orkut.
DeletePhotoTx A Transaction to delete a photo on orkut.
FriendAddActivity An ActivityEntry which represents a friend being added.
FriendRequestEntry Represents an incoming friend request entry.
FriendRequestTx A Transaction to add a person as a friend.
FriendTxFactory Factory for creating transaction related to friends.
GenericActivity A generic ActivityEntry.
GetActivitiesTx A Transaction to fetch activities for a user.
GetAlbumsTx A Transaction to get one (or multiple) albums from orkut.
GetFriendTx A Transaction to get friends list of a user on orkut.
GetPhotoCommentsTx Factory for creating transactions for accessing comments.
GetPhotosTx A Transaction to get one or more photos from orkut.
GetProfileTx Transaction for fetching profile of a user.
GetScrapsTx A Transaction to fetch scraps for a user on orkut.
GetScrapsTx.MessageFormat  
JsonComparator A comparator for comparing json objects.
MakamakaActivity Represents an ActivityEntry for an app related activity.
MediaItem A media item in an Activity related to a photo or a video.
OrkutError A error reported by a failed Transaction.
OrkutPerson Represents the profile information for a person.
PendingFriendRequestTx Fetches list of pending friend requests.
Photo A photo object entity.
PhotoCommentActivity An ActivityEntry generated when a photo is commented on.
PhotoShareActivity Represents PhotoShare activity.
PhotosTxFactory A factory to generate orkut photos related Transactions.
PostActivityTx A Transaction that posts an activity on orkut.
ProfileTxFactory Factory for creating transactions related to user profile.
ProfileUpdateActivity An ActivityEntry associated with a user updating his/her profile.
ProfileUpdateActivity.ProfileFields  
ScrapActivity A scrap related activity on orkut.
ScrapEntry A scrap on orkut.
ScrapTxFactory Factory for creating Transactions related to Scraps.
SocialEventActivity An ActivityEntry for an event on orkut.
StatusMessageActivity An ActivityEntry for a status message change on orkut.
TestimonialActivity An ActivityEntry for a testimonial on orkut.
Transaction Represents a transaction.
UpdateAlbumShareTx A Transaction to share an album with friends.
UpdateAlbumTx A transaction to update an album on orkut.
UpdatePhotoTx A Transaction to update a photo on orkut.
UpdateProfileTx Transaction object for updating profile of self.
UploadPhotoTx A Transaction to upload a photo to an orkut album.
UploadPhotoTx.ImageType  
Util Contains utility functions required by the orkut client library
VideoShareActivity An ActivityEntry which represents a video being shared on orkut.
WritePhotoCommentsTx A Transaction to write a comment for a photo on orkut.
WriteScrapTx A Transaction to write a scrap on orkut.
 

Exception Summary
CreationException Exception thrown to indicate incorrect json being used to create objects.
RequiredFieldNotFoundException  
 

Package com.google.orkut.client.api Description
